## getVertexAttributeFormat() function

Get vertex attribute type of specified vertex format

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function getVertexAttributeFormat(fmt: VertexAttribFormat): "f32" | "i32" | "u32" | "u8norm" | "i8norm" | "u16" | "i16" | "u16norm" | "i16norm" | "f16";
```

The vertex format

**Returns:**

"f32" \| "i32" \| "u32" \| "u8norm" \| "i8norm" \| "u16" \| "i16" \| "u16norm" \| "i16norm" \| "f16"

Vertex attribute type, possible values are 'f32', 'f16', 'i32', 'u32', 'i16', 'u16', 'i8norm', 'u8norm', 'i16norm', 'u16norm'
